00058 public:
00059     enum Layout { NO_PANES = 0, SINGLE_PANE, LEFT_RIGHT, TOP_BOTTOM, LEFT2_RIGHT,
00060                     LEFT3_RIGHT, LEFT_RIGHT2, LEFT_RIGHT3, TOP2_BOTTOM, TOP3_BOTTOM,
00061                     TOP_BOTTOM2, TOP_BOTTOM3, FOUR_PANE, NUM_LAYOUTS };
00062     enum QDMode { QDOff = 0, QDWire, QDSmooth };
00063     enum ViewOperation { NoOperation = 0, OrbitCamera, RotateCamera, PanCamera, DollyCamera,
00064         BankCamera, ZoomDCamera, ZoomFCamera };
00065 
00066     enum NodeClickMode { Node = 0, SkeletonThenNode, Skeleton };
00067     enum RegionClickMode { Nested = 0, Flat };
00068     
00069     enum ViewMouseBtnAccelerator { NoAccel = 0, LeftClick, RightClick, MidClick, AltLeftClick, AltRightClick,
00070         AltMidClick, CtrlLeftClick, CtrlRightClick, CtrlMidClick, ShiftLeftClick, ShiftRightClick,
00071         ShiftMidClick, CtrlAltLeftClick, CtrlAltRightClick, CtrlAltMidClick, CtrlShiftLeftClick,
00072         CtrlShiftRightClick, CtrlShiftMidClick, AltShiftLeftClick, AltShiftRightClick,
00073         AltShiftMidClick, CtrlAltShiftLeftClick, CtrlAltShiftRightClick, CtrlAltShiftMidClick };
00074 
00075     enum ViewMouseModifier { NoModifier = 0, Alt, Shift, Ctrl, CtrlAlt, CtrlShift, CtrlAltShift, ShiftAlt };
